timeline.message: TSK-1344: added key for all rows

timeline.bodyText:
an alternative to this is to expect that the current user has read access to every workbasket in the report.
A missing access id leads to a missing displayname for that specific workbasket. Is this an assumtion we can make?
timeline.author: mustaphazorgati
